HOME
SERVICES
SERVICE CUSTOMIZATIONS
Service Customizations

With service customizations, you can offer flexible customizations and add-ons for your services to create personalized client experiences.

If your business offers haircuts, you can collect information about your clients’ hair length and hair texture at the time of booking to customize their experience.

If your business offers massages, you can give clients the option to select add-ons such as massage oils or hot stones for an additional price.

Service customizations are highly flexible. You can set up customizations that:

Are required or optional

Increase or decrease the service price and/or duration

Add a resource requirement to the service

To enable service customizations, go to Apps > Manage apps > Service Customizations and select Enable.

To learn more about service customizations, the following on-demand videos are available:

Video: Service Customizations for Spas

Video: Service Customizations for Hair Salons

Video: Service Customizations for Nail Salons

The articles in this section cover service customizations, including how to set up customization options and customize a service for an appointment.
